data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,364,326 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, convict the 15,175 believers in Auraiya, Uttar Pradesh, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Auraiya to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please remember the Gadaria (Muslim traditions) people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please give the church in the county of Auraiya prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Auraiya that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Auraiya to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

location.name: Auraiya
